nodes.text: Cutter Poole was a human male who was a new recruit into Blade Squadron, a B-wing unit. Lieutenant Gina Moonsong considered him to be a "glory boy." Shortly after his induction, he was killed during the battle of Malastare when a TIE fighter got behind his craft.
Cutter Poole first appeared in the 2015 canon short story Blade Squadron: Zero Hour in Star Wars Insider 160.
